metadata.dc:author: Costa-Casaretto, C
metadata.dc:description: A physician and writer he integrated the Editorial Committee of the Revista MÃ©dica de Chile, in charge of the Chronicle. He was the first physician to be incorporated to the Chilean Language Academy, a Secretary at the University of Chile, a Senator and a Minister of Justice. He was the author of an overview of Chilean Poetry (1866) and numerous poems, essays and novels. Remarkable is his note regarding a "decrease in the level of atmospheric ozone", reported in 1872.
metadata.dc:title: Adolfo Valderrama (1834-1902).
